dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2006 IH: Department of Government Efficiency Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mills (for himself, Mr. Bean of Florida, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. Rulli, Mrs. Spartz, and Mr. Issa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14210 relating to implementing the Presidentâ€™s Department of Government Efficiency workforce optimization initiative.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Department of Government Efficiency Act or the DOGE Act.
Executive Order 14210 (90 Fed. Reg. 9669, relating to implementing the President's Department of Government Efficiency workforce optimization initiative) shall have the force and effect of law.
